Realizes the grave consequences of missing MDT in a timely manner (useless in an hour, sick in 2, dead in 24), demonstrating awareness of his own condition and situation.
Runs from Van Loon's office clutching the severed hands box, desperate and frightened, pushing people out of the way to get to the elevator.

Sweating and panicked, unable to think clearly after receiving gruesome warning.

Backs away in horror as intruders try to break in, breathes shallow and panicked.
Considers taking his own life to avoid a slow, horrible death at the hands of enemies.
